hero.services: video marketing / performance marketing / web development / ai integrations

about.subtitle: What we do
about.title: We Turn Creativity Into Measurable Results.
about.description1: We are a digital agency focused on performance creative, growth marketing, and web plus AI integrations. Our job isn't to make "pretty" content, but solutions and systems that generate leads and sales.
about.description2: We have 10 years of experience across various industries. We work with a clear process: research, strategy, production, iterations, and reporting. No generic packages and no empty promises.

items.title: Video Production
items.desc: From market research and concept development to complete production planning and execution. We don't base our strategy on fleeting trends and sketches, but on clear messaging and brand identity to ensure content is authentic, long-term usable, and result-oriented.

items.title: Performance Marketing
items.desc: Data-driven campaigns, not your "cousin's advice". Test plans, optimization, and reporting tied to real business goals, not "engagement" and "trash traffic".

items.title: Graphic Design
items.desc: We don't do decoration and "prettifying". Every design has its "why" - driven by the psychology of attention, readability, and decision-making. Design isn't meant to be complicated, but to solve problems and clearly convey the message.

items.title: Web Development
items.desc: Websites and landing pages with one purpose: convert visits into inquiries or purchases. Offer structure, speed, tracking readiness, and clear CTA flow.

items.title: AI Integrations
items.desc: AI and automation that shorten the path from inquiry to sale. Lead qualification, routing, follow-up, and integration with CRM and internal tools.

items.title: Strategy & Consulting
items.desc: We don't give opinions off the cuff. We audit the current state, define priorities, and create a clear execution plan. You get concrete recommendations, creative direction, and a measurement system your team can implement immediately.

contact.title: First we listen,
contact.description: The best approach is to contact us, let us hear your pain points, and together we'll find a path to improve your business.

modal.title: Get In Touch
modal.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
modal.error: Failed to send message. Please try again or contact us directly at office@fulkrums.com

footer.description: Digital agency that turns creativity into measurable results.

quickieLiga.title: Quickie Liga
quickieLiga.delivery: 6 videos, 10 statics, 1 YouTube video, 2 short-form, photos
quickieLiga.overview: Quickie Liga needed to fill the registration quota for children aged 5-13. We took over the complete marketing strategy and execution, from analysis and message positioning to creative production and campaign optimization. In less than two months, the quota was achieved and exceeded by 21 registrations.
quickieLiga.challenge: We built the creative through 6 videos: 3 talking head videos (coach, director, child) with different hooks and variations, and 3 videos explaining benefits, competition structure, and presentation. In addition, we delivered 10 static visuals through multiple angles. During each round, we covered the event with content: 1 YouTube video, 2 short-form videos, and bonus photos.

bestdriveMaja.title: Bestdrive Maja
bestdriveMaja.services: Tracking setup - Catalog - Meta campaigns - Creative
bestdriveMaja.delivery: Webshop integration with Meta Business, Pixel (Purchase, Initiate Checkout), catalog, campaigns, 10 statics
bestdriveMaja.overview: For the winter season, Bestdrive Maja Gume's goal was to launch winter tire sales through the webshop via Meta campaigns. Through analysis, we determined that the webshop was not properly connected to the Meta Business system, which prevented reliable measurement and optimization towards sales. Therefore, we first integrated the webshop with the Meta Business account, set up Pixel and key Purchase and Initiate Checkout events to enable algorithm learning and deliver real results.
bestdriveMaja.challenge: Due to the short deadline for implementation, we connected the product catalog in parallel and set up sets in Meta Ads, and created 10 static visuals with different angles tailored to the target group. The communication focus was on simple webshop purchasing, fast delivery, and a clear ordering process. Over a 30-day period, the campaign achieved 222 web purchases with a total spend of $241.85, with a cost per purchase ranging from $0.37 to $8.60 per set.

itWorksMarketing.title: It Works Marketing
itWorksMarketing.services: Creative strategy, scripts, video editing, graphic design, Meta Ads management
itWorksMarketing.overview: It Works is a health and wellness e-commerce brand that sells through a webshop in the USA, targeting women 25-45. The main campaign goal was to convert social media users into customers, with a specific category challenge: skepticism towards nutritional products and ads that sound 'too good to be true'.
itWorksMarketing.challenge: We took over the complete execution: creative approach, scripts, video design and editing, and running Meta Ads campaigns towards sales. Instead of generic ads, we built creative that builds trust and clearly communicates the value proposition, then tested performance through separate sets by creative type (statics and videos) to get clean learning and faster optimizations. In the period Oct 1, 2025 - Dec 9, 2025, the campaign achieved 2,049 website purchases, with a cost per purchase ranging from $3.83 to $5.17 per set, with a total of 753,213 impressions on displayed ad sets.

carKeyCentral.title: Car Key Central
carKeyCentral.geoTargeting: 5 miles around 2125 N Cicero Ave, Chicago, IL 60639
carKeyCentral.goal: More scheduled store visits, CAC up to $20
carKeyCentral.services: Meta Ads setup, Pixel and tracking, campaign and optimization, creative and copy
carKeyCentral.result: 141 Meta leads, $3.73 CPL, $525.76 spend, 26,225 impressions, 13,783 reach
carKeyCentral.overview: Car Key Central is a physical store for duplicating keys and car fobs in Chicago. The client did not have a Meta Ads account, and the goal was clear: increase the number of scheduled store visits with an acquisition of $20 or less per customer, within a very narrow radius of 5 miles around the location.
carKeyCentral.challenge: We took over the complete setup and campaign execution, from opening and connecting the Meta Ads system, to setting up Pixel and tracking, then creating offers and creative for the local audience. The message focus was on the main customer pain point: the need for an additional key at an affordable price for peace of mind, worn-out keys, or increasing vehicle value. We set up the campaign as a local funnel that quickly converts attention into inquiry and concrete store visits. In the first 30 days, the campaign achieved 141 Meta leads with an average cost of $3.73 per lead, with a total spend of $525.76.

atleta.title: Atleta
atleta.services: Creative, Meta lead campaign, Lead qualification, Optimization
atleta.funnel: Lead form + phone verification + 2 qualification questions
atleta.result: 105 qualified leads, campaign paused due to capacity
atleta.overview: The campaign goal for Athletic Conditioning was to acquire 10 to 15 new child registrations, and in 12 days we achieved 105 leads... We set up a lead funnel with mandatory mobile number verification and two basic qualification questions to improve lead quality and facilitate initial conversation.
atleta.challenge: We built the creative through 3 videos: 2 talking head videos (club director and a famous young athlete training at the club) and one faceless video with program specifications and benefits, plus 5 static visuals with different approaches for testing and better Meta Andromeda algorithm learning. Within 12 days, the campaign generated 105 qualified leads, after which the client requested pausing the campaign due to lack of capacity to process applications and enrollment.

igny.title: IGNY
igny.services: Strategy - Creative - Meta Ads campaign - Optimization
igny.funnel: Meta Ads -> Landing page -> App download
igny.overview: The campaign goal for IGNY was to achieve app downloads in the first launch phase, with a very low budget and narrow target group: parents of children aged 8-14. Since this is a new app, we used a landing page as an intermediate step before download, so parents could clearly familiarize themselves with the project and benefits before making a decision.
igny.challenge: We created the strategy, plan, and complete Meta Ads campaign execution, and built creative that clearly communicates the app's purpose and value for parents. We delivered 7 static visuals and 4 video ads with different angles and variations to get stable learning and optimization. In the first 30 days, the campaign achieved 190 app downloads.

sommerhagene.title: Sommerhagene
sommerhagene.services: Initial strategy formulation, performance marketing (catalog and pitch video creation), social media communication
sommerhagene.overview: Sommerhagene - formulation of initial strategy, performance marketing (creation of catalog and pitch video), and start of communication on social networks. Also, plans for next year.
sommerhagene.challenge: We took over the complete initial phase of the project, from strategy formulation to realization of performance marketing materials. We created a catalog and pitch video, and established the foundation for social media communication.

atraktiv.title: Atraktiv
atraktiv.overview: Video content creation for Atraktiv Magazine
atraktiv.challenge: Dynamic video production for social media engagement
